# dso-tab



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property             | Attribute    | Description                                                                                                | Type                   | Default     |
| -------------------- | ------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------- | ----------- |
| `active`             | `active`     | Is tab active.                                                                                             | `boolean \| undefined` | `undefined` |
| `disabled`           | `disabled`   | Is tab disabled.                                                                                           | `boolean \| undefined` | `undefined` |
| `identifier`         | `identifier` | Adds a unique identifier for the tab. Use this instead of html `id` attribute.  Auto generated if not set. | `string`               | `uuidv4()`  |
| `label` _(required)_ | `label`      | The text that is shown on the tab.                                                                         | `string`               | `undefined` |
